title: How much money would I make selling beats online when starting out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably not much starting out. Most beat makers start making free beats and posting them on YouTube and other places. As you gain traction and a following, you can setup a website where people can Lease or Buy your beats. Most newcomers will charge $15-$30 for a beat lease and up to $250 or more for exclusive rights.
